name: Elf Mouse
full_text: Français en bas Description The paid version provides 2 pdfs, French and English. If you choose the paid version, the English pdf is printer friendly (15 pages, instead of 35 on the website). I present you Casper and Parch! These two elf mice are adorable, have such unique personalities, and are so much fun to knit up! Casper is very festive and outgoing in his red and blue outfit whereas Parch has more of a gypsy vibe with his woodsy color scheme. The elf mouse is knit in the round, bottom up. There is minimal sewing. The arms and tail are worked separately, then knitted with body. The ears are knit by picking up marked stitches. The eyes can be embroidered or 4.5mm safety eyes can be inserted. The nose and mouth are embroidered. The hat is knit in the round. The tunic and pants are knit flat, then seamed. At just 6 inches (15 cm) tall this project is a great stash buster and it knits up pretty quickly! Material Sample 1 – Red Hat and Blue Shirt Blue Sky Fibers Woolstok Light 100% fine Highland Wool; 218yd/199m per 50g skein ; MC 2303 Highland Fleece; approximately 0.2 skein CC 2320 Spring Ice; approximately 0.2 skein CC2 2315 Red Rock; approximately 0.2 skein Skill Level Intermediate ———- Description Ce patron est maintenant disponible en français . L’achat inclus deux pdfs: la version française sur 13 pages et la version anglaise sur 15 pages (plutôt que 35 pages en anglais uniquement, sur le site web). Je vous présente Casper et Parch! Ces deux souris lutins sont adorables, ont leur personnalité unique, et sont si amusantes à tricoter! Casper est plutôt festif et extraverti en bleu et rouge tandis que Parch dégage un air bohémien. Matériel Échantillon 2 – Tuque pourpre et chandail vert Madelinetosh Unicorn Tails 100% Merino Wool; 52yd/48m par 14g skein ; CP Dustweaver; approx 0.5 écheveau CC1 Oak; approx 0.3 écheveau CC2 Penumbra; approx 0.5 écheveau CC3 Well Water; approx 0.3 écheveau CC4 Filtered Day Dreams; approx 0.3 écheveau Niveau de compétence Intermédiaire
